name: Force Full Width Shortcode
author: Jacob Goh

sections.description:
Extend image (or iframe or other elements) in your page/post to the full browser width with simple shortcode

[jg-ffw] Your element [/jg-ffw]

Demo: http://force-full-width-shortcode.jacobgoh.com/

** Only works when the page/post does not have sidebar

GitHub: https://github.com/jacobgoh101/force-full-width-shortcode
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload force-full-width-shortcode.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Extend any element in your page/post to the full browser width with simple shortcode
